/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of shops and restaurants, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and banners in red and yellow, adding a splash of color to the scene. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
